comment:
Extracted Variables:
- Let x be the number of bus trips.
- Let y be the number of car trips.

Definitions:
- x: Number of bus trips to transport monkeys.
- y: Number of car trips to transport monkeys.

Extracted Constraints:
- Monkey Constraint: 20x + 6y \geq 300
- Time Constraint: 30x + 15y \leq T
- Bus Trips Constraint: x \leq 10
- Car Trips Constraint: y \geq 0.6(x)

Objective:
- Minimize T

Note: The comparison operators have been replaced with \geq (greater than or equal to) and \leq (less than or equal to) to meet the requirements of a solvable LP or MIP model.
